Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object
The Reservation class defines and stores a reservation

  • Constructor Details

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(int resNumber, String resName, String resType, LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate, int numberOfRooms)
      Constructor to create new instance of Reservation (used when reading from user input).
      Parameters:
      resNumber - An integer that identifies the reservation.
      resName - The chosen name of the reservation.
      resType - The type of the reservation (S or AP).
      checkInDate - The date that the customer is planned to check in at.
      checkOutDate - The date that the customer is planned to check out at.
      numberOfRooms - The number of rooms reserved.

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(int resNumber, String resName, String resType, LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate, int numberOfRooms, ArrayList<Room> rooms, double totalCost)
      Constructor to create new instance of Reservation (used when reading from user input).
      Parameters:
      resNumber - An integer that identifies the reservation.
      resName - The chosen name of the reservation.
      resType - The type of the reservation (S or AP).
      checkInDate - The date that the customer is planned to check in at.
      checkOutDate - The date that the customer is planned to check out at.
      numberOfRooms - The number of rooms reserved.
      rooms - The rooms reserved by the reservation
      totalCost - The total cost of the reservation.

      This method returns the reservation number.
